resources.string: This app is the official lico-update app of The Linux Counter Project. It will read all needed, system related information from your smartphone and send this information to The Linux Counter Project (https://www.linuxcounter.net). If you do not provide a machine number and an update key for a machine, then it will create a new machine under your LiCo account.
Please continue by touching the button below. You then have to enter (or check) your Linux Counter data...
Save your Machine-ID\nand Machine UpdateKey\nand get system information
Please enter the ID of the machine from your profile on https://www.linuxcounter.net.
Please also enter your machine updatekey. You can see the machine updatekey when visiting your profile on https://www.linuxcounter.net and then clicking on the machine you want to update.

If you want to update an existing machine and you have entered a machinenumber above, then also enter your update key for this machine here. You can find the update key, when editing the machine on https://www.linuxcounter.net.

The following data will be sent to the Linux Counter if you decide to continue. Please check the data carefully and then confirm sending this data by touching the button below (you may need to scroll).
